thread.title: Netflix Announces a Second Season of the Mysterious Psychological Drama ‘The OA’
thread.title_full: Netflix Announces a Second Season of the Mysterious Psychological Drama ‘The OA’

author: Lori Dorn
title: Netflix Announces a Second Season of the Mysterious Psychological Drama ‘The OA’
text:
Netflix announced that the mysterious drama series “ The OA ” has been renewed for second season with a campaign of ominously ethereal teaser trailers , although a premiere date has not been decided as of yet. 
Something always survives. Coming: The OA Part II.
A video posted by The OA (@the_oa) on Feb 8, 2017 at 7:49am PST 

A video posted by The OA (@the_oa) on Feb 8, 2017 at 7:51am PST 

A photo posted by The OA (@the_oa) on Jan 6, 2017 at 9:00am PST
